com.gh.bmd.jrt.builder

Class RoutineConfiguration.Builder<TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gh.bmd.jrt.builder.RoutineConfiguration.Builder<TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    TYPE - the configurable object type.
    Enclosing class:
    RoutineConfiguration

    public static final class RoutineConfiguration.Builder<TYPE>
extends Object
    Builder of routine configurations.

      • with

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> with(@Nullable
                                              RoutineConfiguration configuration)
        Applies the specified configuration to this builder. A null value means that all the configuration options need to be set to their default value, otherwise only the set options will be applied.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the routine configuration.
        Returns:
        this builder.

        Returns:

      • withCoreInvocations

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> withCoreInvocations(int coreInvocations)
        Sets the number of invocation instances which represents the core pool of reusable invocations. A RoutineConfiguration.DEFAULT value means that it is up to the framework to choose a default number.
        Parameters:
        coreInvocations - the max number of instances.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number is negative.

      • withFactoryArgs

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> withFactoryArgs(@Nullable
                                                         Object... args)
        Sets the arguments to be passed to the invocation factory.

        Note that, in case no constructor taking the specified arguments as parameters is found, an exception will be thrown.
        Note also that, the specified objects will be retained, so, they should be immutable or never change their internal state in order to avoid concurrency issues.

        Parameters:
        args - the arguments.
        Returns:
        this builder.

      • withInputMaxSize

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> withInputMaxSize(int inputMaxSize)
        Sets the maximum number of data that the input channel can retain before they are consumed. A RoutineConfiguration.DEFAULT value means that it is up to the framework to choose a default size.
        Parameters:
        inputMaxSize - the maximum size.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number is less than 1.

      • withInputOrder

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> withInputOrder(@Nullable

        Sets the order in which input data are collected from the input channel. A null value means that it is up to the framework to choose a default order type.
        Parameters:
        orderType - the order type.
        Returns:
        this builder.
